price: Kur ai t’i vërë re prej së largu, ata do t’ia dëgjojnë vlimin dhe rënkimin.
arabic: إِذَا رَأَتۡهُم مِّن مَّكَانِۭ بَعِيدٖ سَمِعُواْ لَهَا تَغَيُّظٗا وَزَفِيرٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: idhā ra-athum min makānin baʿīdin samiʿū lahā taghayyuẓan wazafīran
